content.description: On the right side of Diatribe Roof Boulder you can follow a small crack seam almost into the dark split between the boulders. Start in the last useable portion of the very thin crack. Post a foot onto the base below and traverse left, linking into a higher seam once this one diminishes. Traverse left to the end of the boulder to top out over the nose.

In the left portion of the roof is a dark corner with a long crack line following into the base of the nook. match the back of the crack and use the back boulder as feet (left boulder off) and work out of the roof and crack with fun footwork to gain the nose for the top out.

Start midway under the low, horizontal roof on opposing sidepulls on either side of the underbelly (left hand a bit further out of the boulder, right hand crimp a bit lower close to the heel hook). Paste a heelhook in the "eye" crimp and pull on. Blast back to a jug and follow out of the short roof to top out over the nose.

So good! Several lines run across and from under this low, long roof. With a cant-be-beat landing (not that youre falling far anyway) and quality problems from v2-v7, youre sure to drop pad and session here on youre visit to the area! Definitely pull onto "Diatribe" while youre here.
